exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameHeadSkin" width="400" height="200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" y="24" x="29" source="scoreBg0_png"/>
	<e:Group id="headGroup" height="65" width="65" x="36" y="82"/>
	<e:Label id="nameLabel" text="标签标签标签标签" x="104" y="91" width="167" textColor="0x020000" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="18" height="30" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" y="117" text="99" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="166" size="50" x="104" height="48" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0x343131"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Group id="skyGroup" width="1920" height="1080">
		<e:Image id="sky" y="0" source="game_sky_png"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="treeLeftGroup" height="1080" width="1920">
		<e:Image source="game_tree0_png" x="517" y="35" width="114" height="204"/>
		<e:Image source="game_tree1_png" x="605" y="29" width="164" height="219"/>
		<e:Image source="game_tree3_png" x="357" y="31" width="143" height="222"/>
		<e:Image source="game_tree3_png" y="19" x="251" width="157" height="242"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="treeRightGroup" width="1920" height="1080">
		<e:Image source="game_tree0_png" width="112" y="33" height="202" x="1139"/>
		<e:Image source="game_tree1_png" width="148" y="66" height="199" x="1531"/>
		<e:Image source="game_tree1_png" width="164" y="29" height="221" x="1255"/>
		<e:Image source="game_tree3_png" width="131" y="45" height="204" x="1407"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="bg0Group" height="1080" width="1920">
		<e:Image source="game_bg0_png" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Rect id="singleFar0" anchorOffsetY="50" y="216" anchorOffsetX="50" width="100" height="100" x="850"/>
		<e:Rect id="singleNear0" x="600" width="100" y="946" anchorOffsetX="50" anchorOffsetY="50" height="100"/>
		<e:Rect id="singleNear1" anchorOffsetY="50" y="946" anchorOffsetX="50" width="100" height="100" x="970"/>
		<e:Rect x="1336" width="100" y="946" anchorOffsetX="50" anchorOffsetY="50" height="100" id="singleNear2"/>
		<e:Rect x="961" width="100" y="216" anchorOffsetX="50" anchorOffsetY="50" height="100" id="singleFar1"/>
		<e:Rect id="singleFar2" anchorOffsetY="50" y="216" anchorOffsetX="50" width="100" height="100" x="1072"/>
		<e:Rect id="grassFarPot0" y="216" x="780" anchorOffsetY="10" width="20" height="20" anchorOffsetX="10" fillAlpha="1"/>
		<e:Rect id="grassFarPot1" anchorOffsetX="10" y="216" x="1133" anchorOffsetY="10" width="20" height="20" fillAlpha="1"/>
		<e:Rect id="grassNearPot0" y="1073" anchorOffsetX="10" anchorOffsetY="10" width="20" fillAlpha="1" height="20" x="273"/>
		<e:Rect id="grassNearPot1" y="1074" anchorOffsetX="10" x="1677" anchorOffsetY="10" width="20" fillAlpha="1" height="20"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="bg1Group" width="1920" height="1080" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="game_bg1_png" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Rect id="far00" height="10" width="10" x="617" y="217" anchorOffsetX="5" anchorOffsetY="5"/>
		<e:Rect id="far01" y="217" anchorOffsetY="5" anchorOffsetX="5" width="10" height="10" x="721"/>
		<e:Rect id="far02" y="217" anchorOffsetY="5" anchorOffsetX="5" width="10" height="10" x="836"/>
		<e:Rect id="far03" anchorOffsetX="5" y="217" anchorOffsetY="5" width="10" height="10" x="968"/>
		<e:Rect id="far04" x="1094" y="217" anchorOffsetY="5" width="10" height="10" anchorOffsetX="5"/>
		<e:Rect id="far05" anchorOffsetX="5" y="217" anchorOffsetY="5" width="10" height="10" x="1210"/>
		<e:Rect id="far06" x="1311" y="217" anchorOffsetY="5" width="10" height="10" anchorOffsetX="5"/>
		<e:Rect id="near00" y="936" anchorOffsetY="50" anchorOffsetX="50" width="100" height="100" x="355"/>
		<e:Rect id="near01" y="936" anchorOffsetY="50" anchorOffsetX="50" width="100" height="100" x="574"/>
		<e:Rect id="near02" y="936" anchorOffsetY="50" anchorOffsetX="50" width="100" height="100" x="780"/>
		<e:Rect id="near03" anchorOffsetX="50" y="936" anchorOffsetY="50" width="100" height="100" x="970"/>
		<e:Rect id="near04" x="1162" y="936" anchorOffsetY="50" width="100" height="100" anchorOffsetX="50"/>
		<e:Rect id="near05" anchorOffsetX="50" y="936" anchorOffsetY="50" width="100" height="100" x="1356"/>
		<e:Rect id="near06" x="1578" y="936" anchorOffsetY="50" width="100" height="100" anchorOffsetX="50"/>
		<e:Rect y="223" anchorOffsetX="10" x="545" anchorOffsetY="10" width="20" fillAlpha="1" height="20" id="grassFarPot2"/>
		<e:Rect y="224" anchorOffsetX="10" id="grassFarPot3" anchorOffsetY="10" width="20" fillAlpha="1" height="20" x="1391"/>
		<e:Rect y="1071" anchorOffsetX="10" x="49" anchorOffsetY="10" width="20" fillAlpha="1" height="20" id="grassNearPot2"/>
		<e:Rect y="1081" anchorOffsetX="10" id="grassNearPot3" anchorOffsetY="10" width="20" fillAlpha="1" height="20" x="1889"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="itemGroup" width="1920" height="1080"/>
	<e:Group id="playerGroup" height="1080" width="1920">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="grassGroup" width="1920" height="1080">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="progressGroup" width="1920" height="1080">
		<e:Image id="progressBg" source="progress_bg_png" y="57" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:Image source="progress_bar1_png" y="86" width="1100" height="20" x="410"/>
		<e:Image id="progressBar" source="progress_bar0_png" y="86" width="1110" height="20" anchorOffsetX="0" x="405"/>
		<e:Image id="progressSlider" source="progress_slider_png" x="383" y="98" anchorOffsetX="31" anchorOffsetY="31"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="scoreGroup" width="1920" height="1080">
		<ns1:GameHead id="gameHead0" x="-6" y="150" skinName="GameHeadSkin"/>
		<ns1:GameHead id="gameHead1" y="305" skinName="GameHeadSkin" x="-6"/>
		<ns1:GameHead id="gameHead2" y="460" skinName="GameHeadSkin" x="-6"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="gameOverGroup" width="1920" height="1080">
		<e:BitmapLabel id="gameOverLabel" font="countDownFont_fnt" text="1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-130" scaleX="2" scaleY="2"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HeadUI2Skin" width="220" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="home_headbg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="home_headmask_png" y="8" id="headMask" x="9"/>
	<e:Label y="9" textColor="0x000000" height="40" text="标签标签标签标签" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="85" width="128" size="18" id="nameLabel" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label y="54" textColor="0x000000" height="23" text="标签标签标签标" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="85" width="130" size="18" id="infoLabel" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ScoreUISkin" width="200" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" text="+10" height="100" width="200" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="50" textColor="0xF9F7F3"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Group id="bgGroup" height="1080" width="1920">
		<e:Image source="homg_bg_jpg"/>
		<e:Image source="home_panel_png" x="304" y="191"/>
		<e:Image source="home_footbg_png" x="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Image source="home_logo_png" x="879" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Image source="home_title_png" y="14" width="594" height="172" x="663"/>
		<e:Image source="home_wa_png" x="236" y="99"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="animGroup" width="1920" height="1080">
		<e:Image source="home_demo_png" x="1108" y="191"/>
		<e:Image id="rightArrow" source="home_arrow0_png" x="1391" y="549"/>
		<e:Image id="leftArrow" source="home_arrow1_png" x="1177" y="548"/>
		<e:Image id="phone0" source="home_phone0_png" x="1325" y="667" anchorOffsetX="37" anchorOffsetY="101"/>
		<e:Image id="phone1" source="home_phone1_png" x="1323" y="666" anchorOffsetX="37" anchorOffsetY="112"/>
		<e:Image source="home_mice_png" x="1420" y="866"/>
		<e:Image source="home_msgbx_png" x="1124" y="668"/>
		<e:Image source="home_bird_png" x="1422" y="144"/>
		<e:Label text="通过手机摆动控制你的角色，获取高分闯关吧！" x="1146" y="722" textColor="0x030000" width="334" height="124" fontFamily="微软雅黑" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		<e:Image source="game_sky_jpg" x="1124" y="282" width="380" height="70"/>
		<e:Image source="game_tree1_png" x="1137" y="281" width="48" height="65"/>
		<e:Image source="game_tree3_png" x="1382" y="282" width="37" height="60"/>
		<e:Image source="game_tree3_png" width="37" y="284" height="60" x="1182"/>
		<e:Image source="game_tree1_png" width="48" y="281" height="65" x="1447"/>
		<e:Image source="game_tree0_png" x="1357" y="281" width="36" height="64"/>
		<e:Image source="game_tree1_png" width="48" y="281" height="65" x="1227"/>
		<e:Image source="game_bg0_png" x="1124" y="334" width="380" height="168"/>
		<e:Group id="playerGroup" height="70" width="70" x="1280" y="397"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="codeGroup" width="250" height="250" x="800" y="199">
		<e:Label text="微信扫码 加入游戏" x="0" y="268" width="250" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="userGroup" width="1920" height="1080">
		<ns1:HeadUI id="head0" x="853" y="543" skinName="HeadUI2Skin"/>
		<ns1:HeadUI skinName="HeadUI2Skin" y="543" x="338" id="head1"/>
		<ns1:HeadUI skinName="HeadUI2Skin" y="543" id="head2" x="597"/>
		<e:Image source="home_player2_png" x="858" y="639"/>
		<e:Image source="home_player0_png" x="337" y="631"/>
		<e:Image source="home_player1_png" x="565" y="637"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="introduceGroup" width="1920" height="1080">
		<e:Image source="home_codebg_png" x="342" y="208"/>
		<e:Label id="introduceLabel" text="标签" x="357" y="259" width="380" height="220" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x010000"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="countDownGroup" width="440" height="320" x="325" y="192">
		<e:BitmapLabel id="countDownLabel" font="countDownFont_fnt" text="1" scaleX="1.2" scaleY="1.2" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LockSceneSkin" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="homg_bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Image source="lock_bg_png" y="110" x="501" height="868"/>
	<e:Group width="1920" height="1080">
		<e:Image source="lock_center_png" y="334" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="lock_phone_png" y="484" x="899"/>
		<e:Rect height="124" width="602" y="813" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" x="653"/>
		<e:Label text="手机对准屏幕按下OK键" x="660" y="874" textColor="0x030000" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="566" height="60" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="40"/>
		<e:Label y="818" textColor="0x030000" height="60" text="进行重力感应校准" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="566" verticalAlign="middle" size="40" x="660"/>
		<e:Image id="hand" source="lock_hand_png" x="948" y="666"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="countDownGroup" height="200" width="200" x="856" y="204">
		<e:BitmapLabel id="countDownLabel" font="countDownFont_fnt" text="99" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-39.5"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="goImg" source="lock_msg_png" y="246" x="963" anchorOffsetX="367" anchorOffsetY="100"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSceneSkin" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1080" width="1920"/>
	<e:Label id="progressLabel" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="60" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" text="0%"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="No1Skin" width="300" height="420" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="result_no1_png"/>
	<e:Group id="headGroup" height="150" width="150" y="197" x="75"/>
	<e:Label id="nameLabel" text="昵称：王老吉" y="360" width="177" size="20" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x010000" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" x="63"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" y="387" textColor="0x010000" text="得分：999" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="177" verticalAlign="middle" size="20" x="63"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="No2Skin" width="300" height="420" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="result_no2_png" y="0"/>
	<e:Group id="headGroup" height="150" width="150" y="140" x="75"/>
	<e:Label id="nameLabel" text="标签" y="298" width="177" size="20" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x010000" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" x="63"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" y="326" textColor="0x010000" text="标签" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="177" verticalAlign="middle" size="20" x="63"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="No3Skin" width="300" height="420" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="result_no3_png"/>
	<e:Group id="headGroup" height="150" width="150" y="101" x="75"/>
	<e:Label id="nameLabel" text="标签" y="261" width="179" size="20" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x010000" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" x="59"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" y="289" textColor="0x010000" text="标签" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="181" verticalAlign="middle" size="20" x="59"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RankHeadSkin" width="300" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="result_scorebg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="headGroup" height="50" width="50" y="28" x="59">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label id="nameLabel" text="标签" y="30" width="180" size="20" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x010000" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" horizontalCenter="56" height="25"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" y="56" textColor="0x010000" text="标签" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="96" verticalAlign="middle" size="20" horizontalCenter="84"/>
	<e:Group height="64" width="55" x="0" y="20">
		<e:BitmapLabel id="rankLabel" font="countDownFont_fnt" text="10" scaleX="0.4" scaleY="0.4" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultSceneSkin" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image source="result_bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Image source="result_title_png" y="52" x="694"/>
	<e:Group id="scoreGroup" height="1080" width="1920">
		<ns1:ScoreHead id="scoreHead0" y="160" skinName="No1Skin" x="810"/>
		<ns1:ScoreHead x="360" y="280" id="scoreHead1" skinName="No2Skin"/>
		<ns1:ScoreHead id="scoreHead2" y="315" x="1270" skinName="No3Skin"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="rankGroup" width="1920" height="1080">
		<e:Image source="result_rankbg_png" y="710" x="119"/>
		<ns1:RankHead id="rankHead0" x="144" y="770" skinName="RankHeadSkin"/>
		<ns1:RankHead x="477" y="770" skinName="RankHeadSkin" id="rankHead1"/>
		<ns1:RankHead id="rankHead2" y="770" skinName="RankHeadSkin" x="809"/>
		<ns1:RankHead x="1142" y="770" skinName="RankHeadSkin" id="rankHead3"/>
		<ns1:RankHead id="rankHead4" y="770" skinName="RankHeadSkin" x="1474"/>
		<ns1:RankHead x="144" y="860" skinName="RankHeadSkin" id="rankHead5"/>
		<ns1:RankHead id="rankHead6" y="860" skinName="RankHeadSkin" x="477"/>
		<ns1:RankHead x="809" y="860" skinName="RankHeadSkin" id="rankHead7"/>
		<ns1:RankHead id="rankHead8" y="860" skinName="RankHeadSkin" x="1142"/>
		<ns1:RankHead x="1474" y="860" skinName="RankHeadSkin" id="rankHead9"/>
		<e:Group height="200" width="200" x="854" y="556">
			<e:BitmapLabel id="countDownLabel" font="countDownFont_fnt" text="1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
